name: Drone simulator: Flying Games
description:
~~~Take a huge flight in the addictive fun arcade game! See how far your drone can fly.~~~

It's a time to explore the huge city with a flying drone just like an airplane. An ultimate parking challenge with a flying drone. Fly through amazing islands, discover beautiful amusement park and roller coaster.

Follow your checkpoints to park your drone in a massive land. Flying around the world and become the best drone pilot ever. Download now "Drone simulator: Flying Games" to put your parking skills to the ultimate test.

Game Features:
• 15 exciting levels to fly a drone
• Unlock new RC drone to collect checkpoints
• Explore a huge massive park
• Realistic physics based engine
• Follow your checkpoints to land your drone carefully
• Several different stages to complete

Become the super flier in this remote-controlled drone game! Fly over the big city to experience Drone aviation like never before. Join it today!

Leave a review and let us know what you think about this fun game. We will use feedback In our upcoming updates!

If you have any queries feel free to ask! Thanks for playing
